Articles.Content:
Let me start out by saying that flying this to orbit was a lot of fun. 8)

Flight tips:

* This craft, due to its asymmetrical nature, relies on heavy use of SAS.

* From launch, the craft has a pitch-down tendency until 4000m, at which it will change to a pitch-up tendency. It is around this 4000m elevation that you have your only opportunity during the launch to safely adjust your heading (roll the craft so your desired heading is in the pitch-up direction).

* Pitch maneuvers during the ascent are best done by tapping the \'f\' key.

* Watch the SAS! If the SAS (not ASAS) units max out, the craft will lose attitude control. Throttle down to keep the SAS within its limits.

Good luck, pilots!

Oh. This is coooooool !

Im going to make a bigger version of this!the bigger it is the more kerbal it is-Roblox
18 brave pilots so far and no flight reports? I want some feedback.

i love it, as you said it pitches over every once in a while, but it looks great and flies well. i\'ve been trying to make something similar after seeing it, but can\'t figure out how you got it to be symmetrical along the x-axis. help?

i love it, as you said it pitches over every once in a while, but it looks great and flies well. i\'ve been trying to make something similar after seeing it, but can\'t figure out how you got it to be symmetrical along the x-axis. help?

The symmetry tool won\'t work for this kind of thing. You have to do it manually.
